meanings.definition: Full of pouting or showing a pout
meanings.sent1: The child's poutful expression made it clear she was upset.
meanings.sent2: She had a poutful look on her face after not getting her favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog seemed poutful when it didn't get a treat.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in a poutful manner, ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: His poutful demeanor could not hide his disappointment.

meanings.definition: Having the quality or characteristic of a pout
meanings.sent1: The poutful child refused to speak to anyone.
meanings.sent2: Her poutful behavior indicated she was in a bad mood.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a poutful meow when it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a poutful appearance with its peeling paint.
meanings.sent5: The poutful expression on his face showed his displeasure.
